channel.title: information age on Dieter's blog
channel.description: Recent content in information age on Dieter's blog

item.title: You can't make bits harder to copy
item.description: I just watched Cory Doctorow's talk which is part of the Authors@Google series on youtube. He made some great points about where the (music) industry gets/does it wrong and about some fundamental flaws in our law systems (especially with regards to copyright). All of which are of course results of the challenges imposed by the "information age". (which I also introduced in my paper about open source and software patents (dutch))
